name: Dash O'Clock
description:
Today is Luke's first-ever football game playing for his National Team, but already he has made a major foul before the game has even started... by sleeping in. Help Luke get to his game in time without crashing the car or else he'll miss the game!

Half the profits from Dash O'Clock will be going to Puttinu Cares foundation. You can learn more about Puttinu Cares foundation if you go on my Facebook page or on the following website: https://puttinucares.org/. 

Would appreciate your support.
